event.description: Cristian Guzman reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Mark Reynolds.
Elijah Dukes grounds into a force out, shortstop Josh Wilson to second baseman Felipe Lopez. Cristian Guzman out at 2nd. Elijah Dukes to 1st.
With Ryan Zimmerman batting, Doug Davis picks off Elijah Dukes at 1st on throw to Josh Whitesell.
Ryan Zimmerman flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Adam Dunn homers (9) on a fly ball to left center field.
Josh Willingham called out on strikes.
Austin Kearns strikes out swinging.
Jesus Flores singles on a line drive to center fielder Chris Young.
Ronnie Belliard singles on a ground ball to left fielder Eric Byrnes. Jesus Flores to 2nd.
John Lannan grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Josh Wilson. Ronnie Belliard out at 2nd.
Cristian Guzman singles on a line drive to right fielder Justin Upton.
Elijah Dukes pops out to second baseman Felipe Lopez.
Ryan Zimmerman flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Adam Dunn called out on strikes.
Josh Willingham flies out to center fielder Chris Young.
Austin Kearns flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Jesus Flores flies out to left fielder Eric Byrnes.
Ronnie Belliard walks.
John Lannan lines out to shortstop Josh Wilson.
Cristian Guzman grounds into a force out, shortstop Josh Wilson to second baseman Felipe Lopez. Ronnie Belliard out at 2nd. Cristian Guzman to 1st.
Elijah Dukes flies out to center fielder Chris Young.
Ryan Zimmerman flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Adam Dunn walks.
Josh Willingham reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by third baseman Mark Reynolds. Adam Dunn to 2nd.
Austin Kearns flies out to center fielder Chris Young.
Jesus Flores grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Mark Reynolds. Adam Dunn out at 3rd.
Pitching Change: Juan Gutierrez replaces Doug Davis, batting 9th, replacing Conor Jackson.
Ronnie Belliard strikes out on a foul tip.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Alex Cintron replaces John Lannan.
Alex Cintron flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Cristian Guzman grounds out, shortstop Josh Wilson to first baseman Josh Whitesell.
Elijah Dukes strikes out swinging.
Ryan Zimmerman homers (6) on a fly ball to center field.
Pitching Change: Scott Schoeneweis replaces Juan Gutierrez, batting 9th.
Adam Dunn strikes out on a foul tip.
Josh Willingham flies out to left fielder Eric Byrnes.
Pitching Change: Chad Qualls replaces Scott Schoeneweis, batting 9th, replacing Ryan Roberts.
Austin Kearns grounds out, pitcher Chad Qualls to second baseman Felipe Lopez to first baseman Josh Whitesell.
Jesus Flores pops out to shortstop Josh Wilson.
Ronnie Belliard grounds out, shortstop Josh Wilson to first baseman Josh Whitesell.
Felipe Lopez flies out to right fielder Austin Kearns.
Chris Young grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Justin Upton walks.
Mark Reynolds flies out to center fielder Elijah Dukes.
Josh Whitesell walks.
Eric Byrnes flies out to right fielder Austin Kearns.
Chris Snyder reaches on a throwing error by first baseman Adam Dunn. Josh Whitesell to 3rd.
Josh Wilson reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher John Lannan to catcher Jesus Flores. Josh Whitesell out at home. Chris Snyder to 2nd.
Doug Davis grounds out, third baseman Ryan Zimmerman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Felipe Lopez walks.
Chris Young singles on a bunt ground ball to first baseman Adam Dunn. Felipe Lopez to 2nd.
Justin Upton flies out to left fielder Josh Willingham.
Mark Reynolds walks. Felipe Lopez to 3rd. Chris Young to 2nd.
Josh Whitesell grounds into a double play, shortstop Cristian Guzman to second baseman Ronnie Belliard to first baseman Adam Dunn. Mark Reynolds out at 2nd.
Eric Byrnes singles on a ground ball to pitcher John Lannan.
Chris Snyder strikes out swinging.
Josh Wilson grounds into a double play, second baseman Ronnie Belliard to shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Adam Dunn. Eric Byrnes out at 2nd.
Doug Davis grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Felipe Lopez grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Chris Young walks.
Justin Upton called out on strikes.
Mark Reynolds grounds out, third baseman Ryan Zimmerman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Josh Whitesell reaches on a fielding error by first baseman Adam Dunn.
Eric Byrnes doubles (5) on a ground ball to left fielder Josh Willingham. Josh Whitesell to 3rd.
Chris Snyder grounds out, third baseman Ryan Zimmerman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Josh Wilson walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Conor Jackson replaces Doug Davis.
Conor Jackson grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Pitching Change: Garrett Mock replaces John Lannan, batting 9th, replacing Alex Cintron.
Felipe Lopez singles on a line drive to center fielder Elijah Dukes.
Chris Young pops out to first baseman Adam Dunn.
Justin Upton singles on a ground ball to center fielder Elijah Dukes. Felipe Lopez to 2nd.
Mark Reynolds walks. Felipe Lopez to 3rd. Justin Upton to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Ron Villone replaces Garrett Mock, batting 9th.
Josh Whitesell lines into a force out, right fielder Austin Kearns to catcher Jesus Flores. Felipe Lopez out at home. Justin Upton to 3rd. Mark Reynolds to 2nd. Josh Whitesell to 1st.
Pitching Change: Logan Kensing replaces Ron Villone, batting 9th.
Eric Byrnes strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Joe Beimel replaces Logan Kensing, batting 4th, replacing first baseman Adam Dunn.
Defensive Substitution: Nick Johnson replaces pitcher Logan Kensing, batting 9th, playing first base.
Chris Snyder singles on a line drive to left fielder Josh Willingham.
Josh Wilson flies out to center fielder Elijah Dukes.

Mark Reynolds walks.
Josh Whitesell walks. Mark Reynolds to 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Wil Nieves replaces catcher Jesus Flores, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Eric Byrnes grounds into a force out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to second baseman Ronnie Belliard. Mark Reynolds to 3rd. Josh Whitesell out at 2nd. Eric Byrnes to 1st.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Miguel Montero replaces Chris Snyder.
Miguel Montero doubles (4) on a ground ball to right fielder Austin Kearns. Mark Reynolds scores. Eric Byrnes to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Joel Hanrahan replaces Kip Wells, batting 4th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chad Tracy replaces Josh Wilson.
Chad Tracy strikes out swinging, catcher Wil Nieves to first baseman Nick Johnson.
